text:
Memo
Miles
From: Fes
REs Further on NEA
Sir, despite youR note, \ fail to find (and Mm probably
Slind) mention of NEA on page 6 of May-I-2-3 minutes. I
HAVE ONLY EXCERPTS, AND FIAL TO FIND; i LOOK AT YOUR COMPLETE
COPY, PAGE 6, AND \ FAIL TO FIND. IvRAISE SUBJECT AGAIN
ONLY TO BE SURE WE FOLLOW THROUGH, ESPECIALLY IF THE
TREASURER IS SUPPOSED TO PAY SOMETHING TO SOMEONE, OR ELSE.
FES
2-20-52
